item.title: Global Surfaces Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Bearish Trend Ahead
item.description: Global Surfaces Ltd has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a prolonged bearish trend, reflecting deteriorating momentum and long-term weakness in the stock’s price action. Time: 8 minutes ago

item.title: Fino Payments Bank Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Bearish Trend Ahead
item.description: Fino Payments Bank Ltd has recently experienced a significant technical development as its 50-day moving average (DMA) crossed below the 200-day moving average, forming a Death Cross. This event typically signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting deteriorating momentum and raising concerns about the stock’s medium to long-term outlook. Time: 8 minutes ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends with Mid Caps Leading Growth
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has revealed a cautiously optimistic picture across Indian equities, with 220 companies reporting results. Positive earnings surprises have increased notably compared to previous quarters, driven primarily by mid-cap stocks, while large caps continue to lag. This report analyses the key trends, sectoral performances, and standout companies shaping the market narrative. Time: 9 minutes ago

item.title: Persistent Systems Q3 FY26: Strong Revenue Growth Meets Margin Pressure
item.description: Persistent Systems Ltd. delivered robust top-line growth in Q3 FY26, with net sales rising 23.38% year-on-year to ₹3,778.21 crores, marking the highest quarterly revenue in the company's history. However, net profit of ₹439.45 crores declined 6.79% sequentially despite growing 17.82% year-on-year, as margin pressures and elevated employee costs weighed on profitability. The stock traded at ₹6,335.50 on January 20, 2026, down 1.56% from the previous close, reflecting investor concerns about the profit decline despite strong revenue momentum. Time: 23 minutes ago

item.title: Zodiac Energy Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amid Continued Downtrend
item.description: Zodiac Energy Ltd’s shares declined sharply to a new 52-week low of Rs.246.9 on 20 Jan 2026, marking a significant drop amid broader market weakness and sectoral pressures. The stock has underperformed its peers and the wider market over the past year, reflecting a challenging period for the construction sector and the company’s valuation metrics. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Power & Instrumentation (Gujarat) Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amid Market Downturn
item.description: Shares of Power & Instrumentation (Gujarat) Ltd have declined sharply to near their 52-week low, closing at Rs 105.7 on 20 Jan 2026, marking a significant drop of 4.99% on the day and underperforming its sector and the broader market. This marks a continuation of a downward trend that has seen the stock lose over 70% in value over the past year. Time: 1 hour ago
